title: LF Diamond 4+ Top Mid Support for Tournament Team

embed.description: Who are we? Desperado Esports is an Organization comprised of several player made teams who agreed to become unified. Doing so they were able to pool their resources; coaches, information, and scrim partners. By unifying a collective of dedicated, passionate dreamers, we can and will create more opportunities than ever.

body:
Hey, I'm Arrowe the Jungler for Desperado Gaming, just one of many team ran by Desperado Esports, our diamond+ team. We are looking for players that have the short term goal of the NACS and the long term goal of the LCS. Although we value skill, we value a positive attitude that's willing to put in the work. If you have the dream of going pro and willing to put in the work, please fill out the application below and we'll contact you when we get the chance.

We are currently taking applications for: Top, Mid, Support, Subs.
If you would like to apply for a staff position please mention so in your application.
